price: ទោះបីជាភស្ដុតាងនានាបានមកដល់ពួកគេក៏ដោយ(វា គ្មានប្រយោជន៍អ្វីដល់ពួកគេឡើយ) លុះត្រាតែពួកគេឃើញ ទារុណកម្មដ៏ឈឺចាប់។
arabic: وَلَوۡ جَآءَتۡهُمۡ كُلُّ ءَايَةٍ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِيمَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: walaw jāathum kullu āyatin ḥattā yarawū al-ʿadhāba al-alīma
